title: Green by Laurence
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Fast food, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, European, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Owned by chef Laurence Salomon whose known for cooking healthy and organic. Small restaurant in the city centre. Conducts cooking classes. Offers plenty of choices, some are vegan -- from burger to bowls, soups, wraps, salads, fresh juices, and desserts.
